One of the best puzzle games ever made! Especially for its time, Portal has fun, interesting gameplay with a dark backstory and several humorous moments.

[h1] Just a classic Game! [/h1]

I¬¥ve played it in 2016 and once aqgain in 2020. It got  me the good old gaming vibes!

what can i say, its Portal, one of the best, most simple, and somehow eerie and freaky games ever. the realisation that GLaDOS is insane, the realisation that theres no workers to be found, and the realisation you might not get out is scary. its a Valve game, what did I expect? some lazy game that was a pure cashgrab? Portal isnt that, its fun, entertaining and keeps you wanting more. 

10/10 Valve make more games and stop milking the shit out of Steam and CSGO
It is a very fun puzzle game with and the villain is funny, you can beat the game and it is easy but there are extra challenges which are harder so there is something for everyone

This is my first steam game that I ever played. Definitely recommended if you want to try something different. Got me while to get the hang of some things but once you get used to it, the game becomes truly enjoyable and fun challenge. Ngl, it left kinda emotional at the end. Can't wait to play Portal 2 now!

Great game with interesting mechanics. Main story is pretty short and I finished in 2 hours, the only tedious part might be the final boss which has great story but lacking game mechanics. Otherwise great game. 4/5
This game introduced me to gaming, its always been a favorite of mine and I have played through it too many times to count. I definitely recommend this to anyone who hasn't played it.

This is a game that everyone, gamer or not, should play and experience at least once in there lives. Portal is damn near, if not, perfection. The game is incredibly easy to access and even master for all players, making it fun for anyone. The source engine shines in the masterpiece of entertainment known as portal, with genuinely fun gameplay, challenging but not overwhelming puzzles, and an enthralling story that sneaks up on the player.

Portal is a fun and creative game. For it's age it is still surprisingly challenging with good graphics and a short story. While it is clearly just a game where the portal technology is being tested and showcased, it is a must-have for Portal fans, and has very challenging achievements.
The main story features various test chambers and cake, and is fairly short. It offers challenges and will test problem solving abilities.
The bonus maps test reaction times as well, with the timed challenges being the hardest part of the game by far.
Portal gets a 7/10.

For more reviews check my Steam profile
Hope you enjoyed my review, god bless you

Absolute classic. Short, but unforgettable, with palpable atmosphere, intuitive and brain-boggling puzzles, terrific writing for the antagonist, and perfect pacing. Absolutely one of Valve's most creative and interesting titles.
